Entries.Wed2: I have to be wary of strangers. Most people don't like a 'wild {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusGender}}}}'.

BeforeMovie.Text: I feel out of place here... I hope I'm not bothering anyone.$s

DuringMovie.Script: /emote Linus 28/message "{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}} is looking at the floor..."

AfterMovie.Text: Why stare at a screen when you could experience these things yourself?$s

BeforeMovie.Text: I feel out of place here... I hope I'm not bothering anyone.$s

DuringMovie.Script: /emote Linus 28/message "{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LinusName}} is looking at the floor..."

AfterMovie.Text: I'm not used to that much stimulation... sorry if I was a disappointing guest, @. I still appreciate your inviting me!
